General.Name: Gold Royalty Corp.
General.Description: Gold Royalty Corp., a precious metals-focused royalty company, provides financing solutions to the metals and mining industry. It focuses on acquiring royalties, streams, or similar interests at varying stages of the mine life cycle to build a portfolio offering near, medium, and longer-term returns for its investors. The company was incorporated in 2020 and is headquartered in Vancouver, Canada.
General.Address: 1188 West Georgia Street, Vancouver, BC, Canada, V6E 4A2
